title: TVD Characters
description: How well do you know the characters of Mystic Falls?

questions.question: Who turned Stefan and Damon into vampires?
questions.explanation: Katherine Pierce gave the brothers her blood before they were killed, turning them into vampires in 1864.

questions.question: What type of supernatural being is Bonnie Bennett?
questions.explanation: Bonnie Bennett is a powerful witch descended from the Bennett bloodline, one of the most powerful witch lineages.

questions.question: Caroline Forbes starts the series as a vampire.
questions.explanation: Caroline starts as a human and is turned into a vampire by Katherine in Season 2.

questions.question: What is Alaric Saltzman's profession?
questions.explanation: Alaric is a history teacher at Mystic Falls High School and also a vampire hunter.

questions.question: What triggers the werewolf gene in Tyler Lockwood?
questions.explanation: The werewolf gene is triggered when a person with the gene kills someone, even accidentally.

questions.question: Who is Elena's biological mother?
questions.explanation: Isobel Flemming is Elena's biological mother who gave her up for adoption to her brother Grayson Gilbert.

questions.question: Matt Donovan remains human throughout the entire series.
questions.explanation: Matt is one of the few main characters who stays human throughout all 8 seasons.

questions.question: What nickname does Damon often call Stefan?
questions.explanation: Damon sarcastically calls Stefan 'Saint Stefan' due to his moral stance and guilt over being a vampire.
